评论概述: Obsessed with these, the perfect slouchy sweatshirt
评论详情: Ordered the dusty rose and taupe colors and I am in love. They are so comfy, nice weight. Not too heavy and not too thin. They’re flattering and I love the vintage wash on the fabric, received many compliments on both, will be getting more. No shrinking, washed well and fit perfectly for that oversized look. Love the quality.
Love the quality, stitching is good but thought it might be a little thicker. Overall I like it and will keep it.

I just placed my order for a 4th color. I have washed, dried and wore the originals. I’m very picky about my clothing and these are perfect! Love the feel and the fit. I am usually between L & XL the L in this fits just like I wanted, oversized. Highly recommend.

All these reviews saying it's huge are so misleading! I got my reg size small and it was so tight, the neckline was weird, and the fabric lowkey sucked. If you buy the blue one, def size up, but I wouldn't buy it. I returned it immediately

Pretty color and the material is soft. I read the reviews and everything said size up. I'm telling you right now if you are average a short girl up to say 5'4"  don't size up. This shirt was huge and I couldn't wear it. Returned sadly.
Clearly not what is pictured. The material gives me the ick. Shoulder stitching is wrong.

评论概述: fabric not the best, no cuffs on sleeves to keep them up
评论详情: The fabric isn't the highest quality but the shirt is cute. I personally don't like that the cuffs are so loose.
This corduroy sweatshirt is lovely. It's cozy and fits as expected.
Very comfortable, maintains shape after washing. Accurate description- well made
Not as soft as I hoped it would be - but I like it.
Good quality and very soft, runs a little big!!

My daughter gave me this for Christmas. It is sooo cute! The material is soft and well made. Kinda looks like corduroy. I’m 5’6, 130 lbs and I got a medium. It’s oversized which is what I wanted, so it’s perfect!
Most comfortable "sweatshirt" I own. Love the way it feels on and fits. I wear it often.

Soft considering all synthetic … got 2 in different colors. Need a few more
Great fit! Tommy and comfy and pretty!
I was very disappointed. It is not very soft and that is the only reason I bought it. I should have sent it back

It doesn’t look like the picture, but it’s now one of my favorite tops. I’m wearing a size small and it’s oversized. Super comfortable with a tighter band on the bottom. I will buy this again in another color!

I loved the pink color of the shirt I purchased. However, it is not very soft, almost scratchy, and doesn't look like the picture. It's more of a crew-neck sweatshirt look. Overall, it's fine, but I would not buy another one.
The fabric was rough and scratchy, was not cozy and comfortable.  Also runs small.  I returned it.
I like the way it fix softness
The color was an ugly brown and mot a mineral washed as shown, the inside was a polyester. I returned it
I would size down on this. I always wear a L and I’m swimming in this like it’s an XXL
Perfectly oversized sweater for fall. I don’t recommend sizing up as it is already very oversized. The material is on the thicker side but still not too hot.
Great shirt..lots of compliments..Love It.. Wore it so many times in such a short time
The sweatshirt is basic, comfortable but not stylish with the stitching, etc. in the photo. It's a good mid-weight sweatshirt though.

This is the perfect over size sweater. It is comfy and warm. It pairs great with leggings as it’s the perfect oversize. I am usually a medium and I still purchased this in a medium and it gives the perfect oversized look. I love it so much I bought it in multiple colors!

The color is a little inaccurate. I purchased the light green (sage). It is a very pale green. The material is not soft. It is very oversized in the top region but not by the hips which makes for a weird fit. I wouldn’t size up for worry it would look too big on top. Not got the flat chested and wide hips.
This shirt looks faded. It is also very scratchy. I plan to return it.
Get lots of compliments. Should have ordered up a size for the oversized look
Love this!!! I bought it in two colors! Will be buying more!!!
Better than expected!  Very comfortable
This shirt is so comfortable and it washes up beautifully.  Great purchase. Size L  It's oversized. Love it!
I love the product. Great quality. True to size for oversized fit. No need to size up. As others have mentioned, the green is more of a khaki. I was disappointed with the color.

I wanted something comfy, cute & cozy for Thanksgiving this year and this popped up on my homepage on sale for $19.99 so I ordered it. I was NOT disappointed!!! It is so soft, almost waffle knit feeling. It is oversized and I did size down to a medium since I've recently lost a lot of weight. I'm glad I did or else it would have been way more oversized than what I wanted. If you want it bigger, oversized then order your regular size, if not size down 1 for a little bit larger fit. The medium was the perfect fit and I will be ordering in more colors. My husband even said he loved how it looked on me and thought I looked "smoking" this Thanksgiving!
This item doesn’t look as cool as the picture. It’s a more basic sweater with less embellishment than it appears in the product photo. Returned.
I ordered the green one and what I received is not green. The material feels dirty and looks nothing like the picture. Returning
The picture is showing a more distressed look but that’s not what I received. It’s just a regular khaki color. With that being said it’s still nice material and I’ll keep it. Definitely cozy.
The quality and size was not what I was expecting at all wouldn’t recommend small was absolutely way to big
Love it. It's cozy and comfortable and love the color. Getting another one.

I really like this top.  It’s more like an oversized sweat shirt.  True to size.  Nice color.  Slightly oversized but not too much.  The shirt is well made.  It had a slight smell that went away when I washed it.  I followed the washing instructions and no shrinkage.
I am 185 pounds, 5’6, and DD chest. I was going for the “baggy” look with leggings for the colder season. It’s great!! Would buy again! I could definitely do a large too!
Warm and cozy! Goes with any pant really!
Color didn’t match, style didn’t match, not comfortable. Wouldn’t recommended.
So cozy. Bought 2. Warm and thick
To big
Lightweight, oversized, comfortable material. Sleeves run a little large/long. Color shade green is a little more of a beige. Simple.
Super soft and fits as shown!
Perfect color, fit, and comfort! Great value for the price as well.
I do love this sweatshirt but I ordered the green one and they delivered me the  khaki colored one
I love this! Fits perfect! Just ordered another color

This is a nice oversize sweat. It’s a corduroy/ sweat blend material; super soft. Fits nice , well made, didn’t shrink or fade. It’s oversized for sure. I could have went down a size& been okay still. I’m normally in a women’s 8/10 if that helps. Medium would still allow plenty of room for that cozy oversized feel.
Got this sweatshirt in two colors and really like them. Not too warm, layers nicely. Does stretch out easily and lose shape so deducted a star.
It does fit a little oversized but I love the color! Very accurate to the pictures!
Super comfortable and washes well.

I was super excited about this sweatshirt. I ordered the green, and what I got looks khaki. Second it is not a cute girlie fit like the photo it doesn't have the cute bubble like sleeves it is a very straight manly fit. The inside was kind of scratchy as well. Would recommend looking elsewhere.

The quality of this item is fantastic. Size down because not only is it truly oversized but the sleeve are long as well. I did find that the sweatshirt is longer than I expected. I have a shirt torso so that probably is a factor as well. Very soft and thick. Great quality and a good price!

类型: Size: MediumColor: Z12 Green Mardi Gras
评论详情: Saw this on boutique websites for more $. I was happy to find this price! It’s so soft & comfy! It was thick enough to wear as a sweatshirt.

I ordered a smaller size than my usual and this was still 4-6” too long in the sleeves and the overall length was halfway to my knees. Also I had to peel the fabric apart from itself along every fold and then had to run my am inside to peel it away,  dry odd. It also had a strong odor. The fabric does feel soft and was a heavier weight for colder weather.
Color and fabric quality as outlined in the product description.  Oversized fit as expected.
Nice comfy sweater. Colour as shown. Great for lounging.
